Trade/Device Name(s): POGO Automatic Blood Glucose Monitoring System
POGO® Automatic™M Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Specimen Container(s): Individual, single use 25 uL HDPE wand inside foil pouch
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for POGO Automatic Blood Glucose Monitoring System with integrated lancing, sample collection, and photometric glucose quantitation for home use
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertips by a single person with diabetes at home for monitoring diabetes control; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use; indicated for adults and adolescents (13+).
